subject: NCAA Lacrosse Championships
Lacrosse
lead_paragraph: More than a decade after Loyola Coach Charley Toomey took a $17,000 salary to join the team as an assistant, the top-seeded Greyhounds will play Maryland for the national championship.
snippet: More than a decade after Loyola Coach Charley Toomey took a $17,000 salary to join the team as an assistant, the top-seeded Greyhounds will play Maryland for the national championship.
